name: Scroll (jpepper10)
description:
A  (very) tiny game on the psychosis of the infinite scroll of social media hacked up in 2 weeks for a 2 credit elective class. 

You are a tiny character trapped in a glitching chatroom feed. A set of letters have escaped from the cracked screen. Navigating with the arrow keys, use them to help your descent; hit the wrong one, though, and you'll glitch back to the start.
